TitlePage.Acknowledgements:
We are grateful to Andrea Caranti, Marco Costantini, Bettina Eick, Helmut Strade, Michael Vaughan-Lee. Without their help, interest, and encouragement, this package would not have been made. We also acknowledge the effort of the referees to improve the implementation and the documentation.
Serena Cicalò would like to thank the Centro de Álgebra da Universidade de Lisboa for their kind hospitality during July - December 2009 and May - September 2010, when the classification of the 6-dimensional nilpotent Lie algebras over fields of characteristic 2 was made and added to the package.
